vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.4;
son of: Bani (H1137I);
father of: Omri (H6018I)
§ Imri = "eloquent"
1) a man of Judah
2) an ancestor of one of Nehemiah's helpers
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Baní; ancestro de Utai; tribu de Judá; (b)   padre de Zacur; reconstructor del muro; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
音利 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "雄辯的"
1) 一位猶大人 (代上 9:4)
2) 協助尼希米的一部分人的祖先 (尼 3:2)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
音利 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "雄辩的"
1) 一位犹大人 (代上 9:4)
2) 协助尼希米的一部分人的祖先 (尼 3:2)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.2;
father of: Zaccur (H2139L)
§ Imri = "eloquent"
1) a man of Judah
2) an ancestor of one of Nehemiah's helpers
